* Unlike Mandarin and Cantonese, this word is not used for {{m|en|o'clock}} in Min Nan.  For {{m|en|o'clock}}, simply use {{lang|nan|tiám}} (ex. {{lang|nan|saⁿ-tiám}} = 3 o'clock).
